review: Works great. I love having Amazon Streaming video and Netflix stream right to the TV. Also, I keep finding out about new apps to download that allow me to watch some shows from cable channels. I ditched cable years ago and I love device like this that allow me to watch what I want whenever I want.
author: Dane

review: I have the amazon tv. THis is even better because it was less money and does the same thing. THe only difference is I don't have the voice command or cannot store anything. BUt for me that is just fine.
author: Randi "dog crazy"

review: Finding a particular title is difficult. Limited selection of recent movies.
author: SANDRA FRANCISKOVIC

review: Easy to install and set up. Remote works great. Lots of movies and tv programs to choose from with Prime membership.
author: Amazon Customer

review: The Fire Stick is fast, easy to setup and operate.  There is plenty of content and with Amazon Prime I have lots to choose from.  I like this much better than my Chromecast.
author: Greg Jackson

review: Works great gave to my mom for a gift and she is not very tech savvy but she said it was easy to start up and get going. She uses it every day.
author: tiffany bridgeman

review: To start off, we got this because we wanted to watch Amazon Prime on TV rather than mirroring it from our iPad to appletv. It's a whole lot better than chromecast!  You do not need to get apps for it or have an android product. All setup too, right out of the box, would recommend this product!
author: Paolo U.

review: Love this Fire Stick. It works great with my Wi-Fi at home. Installation was a breeze.
